Compensation.definition: the act of compensating 2 in the civil law of Louisiana

2.definition: the ending of mutual obligations between two people for money or quantities of fungible things usually by operation of law but sometimes by an agreement

3.definition: something that makes up for a loss [received for the breach of contract]payment to unemployed or injured workers or their dependents see also,

4.definition: payment for a thing of value tendered or a service rendered [the Senators and Representatives shall receive for their services "art. I"]
